import { render } from '@testing-library/react'; import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Form, FormControl, InputGroup, Nav, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import './App.css'; import User from './components/User'; const App = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState('') const [ready, setReady] = useState(false) const getUser = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setReady(false) setUser(e.target.value) } const getReady = (e) => { if (user !== '') setReady(true) } const preventForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (
